name: Apocalypse Era：Son of Prophecy
description:
Apocalypse Era：Son of Prophecy is an action game developed by 9Splay Holding Co. It came out on 21-07-2023. It was published by 9splay Holding Co. The game is rated as "Skip" on RAWG.
You can play Apocalypse Era：Son of Prophecy on Android and PC. You can purchase the game on App Store and Google Play.
